Title: Nolite Te Bastardes Carborundorum
Writer: Margaret Atwood (based on the novel by), Nina Fiore (executive story editor), Leila Gerstein (teleplay by), John Hererra (executive story editor), Bruce Miller (created by)
Actors: Elisabeth Moss, Joseph Fiennes, Yvonne Strahovski, Madeline Brewer
Plot: Punished by Serena Joy, Offred begins to unravel and reflect on her time with Moria at the Red Center; A complication during the Ceremony threatens her survival.
